case_count_quote: A2-cm pulmonary nodule was incidentally discovered.
diagnostic_method_quote: Both highresolution CT (HRCT) and routine contrast-enhanced chest CT were obtained...
imaging_findings: ['a 2-cm nodule with adjacent ground-glass opacity', 'tiny nodules of ground-glass attenuation', 'spiculated nodule in the posterior segment of the right upper lobe', 'ground-glass nodules in the right upper lobe']
imaging_findings_quote: a spiculated 2-cm nodule with adjacent ground-glass opacity... ...tiny nodules of ground-glass attenuation (white arrows)... ...spiculated 2-cm nodule... ...ground-glass nodules...
histopathology_quote: The diagnosis of the main tumor was well-differentiated adenocarcinoma, papillary subtype...) C.
immunohistochemistry_quote: ...meningothelial-like nodules were immunoreactive for epithelial membrane antigen (EMA) and vimentin... ...Meningothelial-like nodules in the lung have been found in people aged 12 to 91 years...
comorbidities_quote: ...Meningothelial-like nodules in the lung have been found in people aged 12 to 91 years, being most common in the seventh decade. They are multiple in 30% to 50%. The lesions are associated with thromboembolism in up to 51% of cases... ...The incidence of the lesions is estimated to be 0.3% to 4% in unselected autopsy cases... Korn et al. (4) described 19 cases, including 14 in females and four in males...
